amendment.description: To amend title IV regarding family engagement in education programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2159 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2159 proposed by Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5033, S5035; text: CR S5033) To amend title IV regarding family engagement in education programs.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2159 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
